User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Block access to admin areas
Disallow: /dashboard
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /signin
Disallow: /signup

# Allow access to important pages
Allow: /find-consultants
Allow: /consultant/*
Allow: /request-quote
Allow: /how-it-works
Allow: /about
Allow: /contact
Allow: /pricing
Allow: /services/*
Allow: /location/*
Allow: /industry/*

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://findbrexitconsultants.co.uk/sitemap.xml
